job_content.description: Head of Digital Marketing & Sales (f/m/x) - leading Job ID:R0393480 Full/Part-Time: Full-time Regular/Temporary: Regular Listed: 2025-07-08 Location: Frankfurt Position Overview The Head of Digital Sales & Marketing for Wealth Management & Private Banking Germany creates and executes the Digital Sales and Marketing strategy for Deutsche Bank across Wealth Management and Private Banking clients in its home market.DB's Wealth Management & Private Banking Germany segment covers private individuals, UHNWIs, entrepreneurs and family offices. We are the strategic partner for our clients' long lasting success by providing holistic advisory, extensive products and access to DB's global network. In addition, we are working on a dedicated remote advisory proposition to cater to evolving client’s demand of digital, and multichannel banking.If you are passionate about making a significant impact and leading a team to new heights, this is the opportunity for you. Join us and be part of a journey that shapes the future of private banking in our home market.Your key responsibilitiesUtilize customer data to segment audiences for better personalizationImplement
